title: Invitation
medium: Letterpress in red and green ink on light yellow wove paper; metal grommet;  mounted on grey-blue wove paper
description: 3-part invitation made of 3 circular cards (red, yellow, green), joined with a grommet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Invitation.
Letterpress in red and green ink on light yellow wove paper; metal grommet;  mounted on grey-blue wove paper. Gift of James Howard Fraser. 2000-68-92.
